name: Just another day (NecroWhisper)
description:
A very short text adventure game about a girl who needs to prepare everything before she meets with her date!

Prepare for unfunny jokes and light hearted content.

This game includes:

-  Many different items for you to interact with, try to give them a closer look!

- A bit of slice of life elements

- One(1) Illustration of the playable character

This game was a part for me to learn C# and Unity.
